sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }); export default function ResultsTable({data,initialInvestment}) { return (
{data.map(yearData => )}
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
{yearData.year} {formatter.format(yearData.savingsEndOfYear)} {yearData.yearlyInterest} {formatter.format( yearData.savingsEndOfYear - initialInvestment - yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year) } {formatter.format(initialInvestment + yearData.yearlyContribution *yearData.year )}
) }
